Half Marathon Program

Complete 12-week training program designed to get you race-ready for your half marathon personal record. Whether it's your first half marathon or you're chasing a PR, this program will get you there.

Get Started Now Learn More

What's Included

Everything you need to successfully complete your half marathon and achieve your personal record.

12-Week Training Plan

Structured weekly training schedule with progressive mileage buildup and recovery weeks.

Personal Coaching

One-on-one coaching sessions and personalized feedback on your training progress.

Race Strategy

Detailed race day strategy including pacing, nutrition, and mental preparation.

Nutrition Guidance

Pre-race, during-race, and post-race nutrition strategies for optimal performance.

Flexible Scheduling

Training plans that adapt to your schedule and lifestyle commitments.

Injury Prevention

Strength training and mobility work to keep you healthy throughout training.

Training Schedule Overview

A progressive 12-week plan that builds your endurance safely and effectively.

1-3

Base Building

  • 15-20 miles per week
  • Easy pace focus
  • Form assessment
  • Strength training intro
4-6

Build Phase

  • 25-30 miles per week
  • Tempo runs introduced
  • Long runs up to 8 miles
  • Hill training
7-9

Peak Phase

  • 30-35 miles per week
  • Speed work sessions
  • Long runs up to 12 miles
  • Race pace practice
10-12

Taper & Race

  • Reduced volume
  • Maintain intensity
  • Race simulation
  • Race day execution
